activities: MindMatters manages client data through its Innovator(tm) software system.  Personal information is entered and maintained by the individual clients.  MindMatters software system stores the information provided by clients and does not release the information.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, United Kingdom
recoursemech: MindMatters has chosen an independent recourse mechanism (IRM) for dispute resolution, which is the Better Business Bureau's EU Safe Harbor Program. This independent third party is made known to MindMatters' clients as the mediator who is able to resolve disputes. Users of the InnovatorTM with privacy poicy complaints should first contact their systems administrator (insert client contact information) with whom the system resides. If the complaint cannot be satisfactorily resolved, then the individual should contact MindMatters at support@us-mindmatters. In the event of the complaint reaching an impasse, the Better Business Bureau's EU Safe Harbor Program should be contacted.
